page.title: 11OVERTON.
page.content: THERE IS A WIDE RANGE OF GOOD QUALITY SHOPS IN OVERTON.THE COMMUNITY CAR PARK SHOULD BE BETTER CONTROLLED. I THINK THAT BRIDGE STREET SHOULD BE MADE INTO A ONE WAY STREET BECAUSE IT IS TOO NARROW.THERE IS A GOOD BUS TIME-TABLE. THERE ARE A WIDE RANGE OF SPORTS PLAYED IN OVERTON INCLUDING SWIMMING AND LOTS MORE.THE DOCTOR'S SURGERY IS IN A GOOD POSITION FOR PEOPLE IN OVERTON. BUT FOR OLD PEOPLE AND PEOPLE WHO DO NOT HAVE A CAR AND LIVE RIGHT OUT OF OVERTON TRANSPORT IS A PROBLEM. THE CHEMIST IS QUITE NEAR THE DOCTORS SURGERY AND HAS NEARLY ALL THE MEDICINE YOU WANT. THE YOUTH HOSTEL IN OVERTON IS IN A GOOD PLACE.THE OLD INFANT SCHOOL HAS BEEN MADE INTO A COMMUNITY CENTRE-GOOD FOR THE COMMUNITY BUT THE INFANTS HAVE FURTHER TO GO TO SCHOOL.
